title: Can you switch from Nightblade yasuo to Dawnbringer Riven?
body: So i didn't know when you finish the 2nd quest with one of the icons it'll remove the other, Is there any way i can switch from the yasuo questline to the riven questline?

replies.body: You can only do those daily missions for one side each day, but if you did Yasuo's today you can still do Riven's tomorrow!
I think you can switch everyday but you can only do one of the quest lines per day
